main.title: Let's go to a restaurant in Ho Chi Minh that only locals know about!
main.checkDate: Please check the date and time again.
main.localGirlfriend: A Day with a Local Friend
main.localGirlfriendDescription: Weâ€™ll be your reliable friend in a new and unfamiliar travel destination.
main.experienceLocalCultureDescription: How about exploring hidden local gems, neighborhood strolls, and restaurants that only locals know about, instead of the usual tourist spots?
main.customGuideServiceDescription: If you have a specific itinerary in mind, no problem! Weâ€™ll be with you wherever you go.
main.specialDayWithLocalGirlfriendDescription: For your safety, we thoroughly verify the identity of all guides before registering them. Our guides pass a 2-step process: a document review and an interview.
main.internationalCoupleDescription: After reviewing the guideâ€™s profile, you can choose to follow their itinerary or request a place you want to visit. We will accompany and support you wherever you go.
main.betaTestDescription: We are currently providing beta service. If you have any inconveniences or suggestions for improvement while using the service, please send feedback to vinaarba@gmail.com. Your valuable opinions help us create better services. Please participate actively!

termsAndConditions.normalDescription: Thank you for using fgfg. fgfg (hereinafter referred to as the "Service") is a platform that allows users to book tour guides and experience various cultures through guides. These terms and conditions govern the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between fgfg and users.
termsAndConditions.serviceDescription: Users must be at least 18 years old and legally capable of entering into contracts.
termsAndConditions.serviceDescription2: Guides must meet all legal requirements and certifications necessary for guide activities.
termsAndConditions.serviceDescription3: Reservations are confirmed after guide acceptance.
termsAndConditions.paymentAndRefundPolicyDescription: All payments within the service must be made through the official fgfg website, and cash payments are not allowed.
termsAndConditions.paymentAndRefundPolicyDescription2: Cancellations or refund requests after booking confirmation will be processed according to the service's refund policy.
termsAndConditions.paymentAndRefundPolicyDescription3: Please contact fgfg staff immediately if you experience any payment-related issues.
termsAndConditions.guideAndUserDutyDescription: Guides must faithfully fulfill their commitments to customers and follow the designated guide course.
termsAndConditions.guideAndUserDutyDescription2: Users must act safely according to guide instructions and must not engage in behavior or speech that puts the guide at risk.
termsAndConditions.guideAndUserDutyDescription3: While fgfg can act as a mediator in case of issues between parties, it bears no legal responsibility.
termsAndConditions.prohibitedActivitiesDescription: Cash payments for additional extended time without going through the official fgfg website are prohibited and may lead to legal issues.
termsAndConditions.prohibitedActivitiesDescription2: Visiting accommodation facilities during guide courses is not allowed.
termsAndConditions.prohibitedActivitiesDescription3: Copying, distributing, or selling fgfg's services and content without permission is prohibited.
termsAndConditions.personalInformationProtectionDescription: Users' personal information is protected according to relevant laws and fgfg's privacy protection policy.
Guides must update their personal information immediately when changes occur.
termsAndConditions.liabilityDisclaimerDescription: fgfg is not directly responsible for issues arising during users' service use and only acts as a mediator in issues between guides and users.
termsAndConditions.liabilityDisclaimerDescription2: fgfg is not responsible for service interruptions or delays due to unavoidable circumstances.
termsAndConditions.amendmentOfTermsDescription: These terms may be amended when necessary, and changes will be notified immediately.
termsAndConditions.amendmentOfTermsDescription2: Users have the right to reject amended terms and may discontinue service use in such cases.
termsAndConditions.contactDescription: Please contact the following email for inquiries about these terms: vinaarba@gmail.com

privacyPolicy.normalDescription: fgfg (hereinafter referred to as the "Service") values users' personal information and complies with Personal Information Protection Law. This privacy policy explains the use and protection of personal information collected when using fgfg services.
privacyPolicy.collectedInformationDescription: Required personal information for service use: name, email, phone number, payment information, etc.
privacyPolicy.collectedInformationDescription2: Information automatically collected during service use: IP address, cookies, access logs, etc.
privacyPolicy.purposeOfCollectionDescription: Service provision and operation: processing user reservations, customer support, payment and refund processing, etc.
privacyPolicy.purposeOfCollectionDescription2: Service quality improvement: service enhancement and customized service provision through user feedback
privacyPolicy.purposeOfCollectionDescription3: Legal compliance: fulfilling legal obligations and resolving legal disputes
privacyPolicy.personalInformationProcessingDescription: The service delegates personal information processing as follows for smooth service provision and efficient work processing.
The service continuously monitors and manages the safe processing of personal information by trustees, and requires immediate deletion of personal information when delegated work ends.
privacyPolicy.contentProvisionDescription: Infrastructure for providing content such as guide photos
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyDisclosureDescription: Personal information is not provided to third parties without user consent. However, exceptions may apply when there are legal obligations or user consent.
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyDisclosureDescription2: When providing to third parties, prior notice and consent will be obtained regarding the information provided, purpose, and receiving party.
privacyPolicy.personalInformationRetention: 6. Personal Information Retention and Usage Period
privacyPolicy.personalInformationRetentionDescription: Users' personal information is deleted immediately after achieving collection and usage purposes.
privacyPolicy.personalInformationRetentionDescription2: However, information is safely stored for the period required by law.
privacyPolicy.personalInformationDisposal: 7. Personal Information Disposal Procedures and Methods
privacyPolicy.personalInformationDisposalDescription: After achieving collection purposes, personal information is moved to a separate database and stored for a certain period according to internal policies and relevant laws before deletion.
privacyPolicy.personalInformationDisposalDescription2: Electronic file information is deleted using technical methods that prevent recovery.
privacyPolicy.userRightsAndMethods: 8. User and Legal Representative Rights and Exercise Methods
privacyPolicy.userRightsAndMethodsDescription: Users can view, modify, or request deletion of their personal information at any time.
privacyPolicy.userRightsAndMethodsDescription2: Legal representatives can request viewing, modification, or deletion of personal information for children under 14.
privacyPolicy.technicalAndManagementMeasures: 9. Technical/Management Measures for Personal Information Protection
privacyPolicy.technicalAndManagementMeasuresDescriptio: Personal information is protected by passwords, and important data is stored in encrypted form.
Personal information access rights are minimized, and relevant staff receive regular security training.
privacyPolicy.amendmentOfPrivacyPolicyDescription: When privacy policy changes occur, changes will be posted on the official fgfg website.
privacyPolicy.amendmentOfPrivacyPolicyDescription2: Changed policies take effect 7 days after posting, and important changes are notified at least 30 days in advance.
privacyPolicy.contactDescription: Please contact the following email for inquiries about this privacy policy: vinaarba@gmail.com

refundPolicy.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy
refundPolicy.description: Full refunds are provided for cancellations due to guide requests or guide no-shows.
refundPolicy.description2: No refunds are available for customer no-shows at the scheduled time.
refundPolicy.description3: Cancellations and refunds are not possible after guide confirmation of the booking.
refundPolicy.description4: Refunds are not available for simple dissatisfaction with guide services.
refundPolicy.contact: Please contact the following email for refund requests or inquiries: vinaarba@gmail.com

signUpGuide.invalidResumePhoto3: Failed to upload photo. Please try again later.
signUpGuide.alreadyRegisteredGuide: You are already registered or under review as a guide.
signUpGuide.privateInformation: Items marked with * are private information.
signUpGuide.name: Name
signUpGuide.resumePhotoDescription: Please register a photo that clearly shows your face.
signUpGuide.signUpCompleteDescription: Your guide registration is complete. Review results and interview location will be sent to your email within 24 hours.
signUpGuide.guideQandA1: Q. What activities will I do as a guide?
signUpGuide.guideQandA1Answer1: You will act as a guide, being comfortable and friendly like a real friend for foreign tourists.
signUpGuide.guideQandA1Answer2: You will visit tourist spots with customers, have casual conversations, and help them experience Vietnamese culture more deeply. You can introduce local restaurants or special places that only you know to create unique experiences for customers.
signUpGuide.guideQandA1Answer3: For customers, you are not just a tour guide but a special friend sharing the real daily life of Vietnam.
signUpGuide.guideQandA2: Q. I'm not good at foreign languages, is that okay?
signUpGuide.guideQandA2Answer: That's fine. Language ability is not a requirement. Feel free to apply.
signUpGuide.guideQandA3: Q. Do I need an interview?
signUpGuide.guideQandA3Answer: Yes. During the interview, we will guide you about precautions and salary as a guide. After submitting the form, interview location and time will be sent to your email within 24 hours.
signUpGuide.guideQandA4: Q. How much can I earn per month?
signUpGuide.guideQandA4Answer: The minimum wage in Ho Chi Minh City in 2024 is about 23,800 VND per hour. Assuming weekend and holiday part-time work hours of 160 hours (20 days X 8 hours), monthly income is about 3,800,000 VND.
signUpGuide.guideQandA4Answer2: When working as an FGFG guide, if you guide about 20 hours per month, expected monthly income is 3,800,000 VND.
signUpGuide.guideQandA4Answer3: We are preparing other compensation systems. Details will be explained during the interview, so please apply first.
signUpGuide.guideQandA5: Q. How long does a typical guide session last?
signUpGuide.guideQandA5Answer: Minimum guide time is 2 hours and average is about 4 hours.
signUpGuide.guideQandA6: Q. Do I have to provide sexual services?
signUpGuide.guideQandA6Answer: Absolutely not. If forced into sexual matters by customers, you can end the tour immediately and leave.
signUpGuide.guideQandA7: Q. Is light physical contact okay?
signUpGuide.guideQandA7Answer: Only holding hands and linking arms are allowed.
signUpGuide.guideQandA8Answer: We guide customers about places to avoid and how to respect guides. Guide safety is our top priority.
signUpGuide.guideQandA9: Q. Which country are most customers from?
signUpGuide.guideQandA10: Q. What should I prepare when working as a guide?
signUpGuide.guideQandA10Answer: You need to prepare basic items and meet customer-specific requirements.

createGuideProfile.createProfileFailed: Failed to create profile. Please try again later.
createGuideProfile.createProfileDescription: Show yourself off with attractive photos and a great guide introduction!
createGuideProfile.pickupLocationDetailDescription: Please provide more specific details so customers won't get lost
createGuideProfile.pickupLocationDetailExample: EX) It's a cafe across from Notre-Dame Cathedral. Let's meet inside the cafe
createGuideProfile.guideQandA1Answer: Customers want to see guide photos and brief introductions. Please understand.
createGuideProfile.guideQandA2: Q. I want to pause my activities for a while.
createGuideProfile.guideQandA2Answer: When you activate the pause feature in the guide management page, you won't appear in guide searches. You can reactivate it later.

reservation.customerAgeRangeDescription: Information that needs to be provided to the guide in advance.
reservation.guideMessageDescription: Please let the guide know about your desired date course, necessary preparations, and why you chose them.
reservation.refundPolicyDescription: Full refund for cancellations due to guide request or guide no-show.
reservation.refundPolicyDescription2: No refund if customer does not show up at the reserved time (No Show).
reservation.refundPolicyDescription3: Cancellation and refund are not possible after the guide confirms the reservation.
reservation.refundPolicyDescription4: No refund for simple dissatisfaction with guide service.
reservation.basicRulesDescription1: Please cooperate so that the guide can safely conduct the tour.
reservation.basicRulesDescription2: Only hand-holding and arm-linking are allowed for physical contact.
reservation.basicRulesDescription3: Tour includes various locations except accommodation facilities.
reservation.basicRulesDescription4: Payment for additional extension time must be made through the official fgfg website.
reservation.basicRulesDescription5: Reservation is not confirmed until the guide accepts the request within 48 hours. If the reservation is declined, the fee will be automatically refunded.
reservation.agreeDescription: By selecting the button below, you agree to fgfg's terms of use and refund policy, and agree that fgfg may charge through your payment method in case of damage due to your fault. You agree to pay the displayed fee when the guide accepts the reservation request.
reservation.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up

paymentSuccess.title: Reservation Complete!
paymentSuccess.description: Please provide your reservation number to the contact information below to proceed with additional payment.
paymentSuccess.reservationCanceled: The reservation will be automatically canceled if payment is not processed within 24 hours. After payment, please wait for guide approval.

reservations.cancelReservationDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel this reservation?

profile.otherInformationDescription: Date of birth (only age is shown), residential address, and phone number are private information, while all other information is public.
profile.inactive: What happens when you pause guide activities?
profile.inactiveDescription: Your guide profile remains public, but customers cannot make reservations. You can resume guide activities whenever you want.

bankAccount.paymentAfter: When will I receive payment after customer payment?
bankAccount.paymentAfterDescription: When a guide accepts a reservation and the customer completes payment, the amount minus commission will be transferred within 1-2 weeks.
bankAccount.wrongAccountNumber: If I entered the wrong account number, can I receive payment again?
bankAccount.wrongAccountNumberDescription: If a transfer has already been made to an incorrect account number, it will be difficult to receive the settlement again.
bankAccount.myBankNotInList: What if my bank is not in the selection list?
bankAccount.myBankNotInListDescription: Please send an email to the administrator and we will add it right away!

guideManual.beforeMeetingDescription1: Please check the message from customers when they make a reservation and reconfirm the meeting place and time through conversation.
guideManual.beforeMeetingDescription2: When preparing for the guide, it's better to plan the course in advance.
guideManual.beforeMeetingDescription3: Never be late for pickup time. Please arrive at the pickup location at least 10 minutes before the pickup time and wait.
guideManual.beforeMeetingDescription4: If you think you'll be late for pickup time, please notify the expected arrival time via message.
guideManual.beforeMeetingDescription5: If you have difficulty proceeding with the guide after accepting the reservation, please apologize to the customer via message and contact the administrator for refund processing. When sending an email, please provide the reservation number that needs to be canceled.
guideManual.afterMeeting: When First Meeting the Customer at the Pickup Location
guideManual.afterMeetingDescription1: Greet with a bright smile and briefly explain the guide plan.
guideManual.afterMeetingDescription2: If you were late, sincerely apologize and ask if they would like additional guide time equal to the late time.
guideManual.guideProgressDescription1: Light hand-holding or arm-linking is allowed, but it should be done at natural timing.
guideManual.guideProgressDescription2: Frequently looking at your phone can disappoint customers, so please focus on the customer.
guideManual.guideProgressDescription3: When visiting restaurants, ask about the customer's food preferences first and try to accommodate if possible.
guideManual.guideProgressDescription4: Visiting accommodation facilities is prohibited. If customers request it, please politely decline.
guideManual.guideProgressDescription5: About 10 minutes before the end of the guide, ask the customer if they would like to extend the guide time.
guideManual.guideProgressDescription6: If customers want to extend the time, they need to check your available time on the official fgfg website, make a reservation, and you accept it. (Reservations cannot be made before the current time.)
guideManual.guideProgressDescription7: Making cash payments for additional extension time without going through the official fgfg website may result in legal issues with fgfg.
guideManual.guideFinishDescription1: Please finish the guide kindly until the end so that the customer can be satisfied.
guideManual.guideFinishDescription2: Express gratitude and briefly ask if they had an enjoyable time.
